H1.text: Snow is the source from which water evaporates mostly.

H2.text: Clouds are the source from which water evaporates mostly.

H3.text: Oceans are the primary source from which water evaporates.

A4.text: Evaporation from the ocean moves water into the atmosphere to later rain back down onto land and the ocean.

A5.text: Oceanic evaporation, as a phase of the water cycle, is the source of most rainfall (about 90%)
